reg_pit.title:
First Nations Clean Energy
Business Fund Regulation

change.changenote: Section 4 (2) (b) amended by BC Reg 41/2016, effective April 26, 2016.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: annual rentals under Parts 2 and 3 of Schedule A of the Water Regulation,

change.changenote: Section 4 (3) BEFORE amended by 7/2017, effective January 27, 2017.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (5) (a) is 75%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) BEFORE amended by 7/2017, effective April 1, 2017.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (4) (b) of the Act is 50%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (3) BEFORE amended by 149/2018, effective July 13, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (5) (a) of the Act is 75%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 7/2017, effective April 1, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (4) (b) of the Act is 55%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 149/2018, effective April 1, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (5) (a) of the Act is 68.18%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) and (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 122/2020, June 3, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (4) (b) of the Act is 50%.
The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (5) (a) of the Act is 75%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) and (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 122/2020, effective April 1, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (4) (b) of the Act is 55%.
The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (5) (a) of the Act is 68.18%.

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) and (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 185/2023, effective July 12, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (4) (b) of the Act is 50%.
The percentage prescribed for the purposes of section 20 (5) (a) of the Act is 75%.
